trans-unit.source: Log on to a virtual machine running Linux in Azure
trans-unit.target: Log on to a virtual machine running Linux in Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to log on to an Azure virtual machine running Linux by using a Secure Shell (SSH) client.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to log on to an Azure virtual machine running Linux by using a Secure Shell (SSH) client.

trans-unit.source: For a virtual machine running a Linux operating system, you use a Secure Shell (SSH) client to log on.
trans-unit.target: For a virtual machine running a Linux operating system, you use a Secure Shell (SSH) client to log on.

trans-unit.source: You'll need to install an SSH client on the computer you want to use to log on to the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: You'll need to install an SSH client on the computer you want to use to log on to the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: There are many SSH client programs that you can choose from.
trans-unit.target: There are many SSH client programs that you can choose from.

trans-unit.source: The following are possible choices:
trans-unit.target: The following are possible choices:

trans-unit.source: On a computer running a Windows operating system, you might want to use an SSH client such as PuTTY.
trans-unit.target: On a computer running a Windows operating system, you might want to use an SSH client such as PuTTY.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <linkText>PuTTY Download Page</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see the <linkText>PuTTY Download Page</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: On a computer running a Linux operating system, you might want to use an SSH client such as OpenSSH.
trans-unit.target: On a computer running a Linux operating system, you might want to use an SSH client such as OpenSSH.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <linkText>OpenSSH</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <linkText>OpenSSH</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For more requirements and troubleshooting tips, see <linkText>Connect to an Azure virtual machine with RDP or SSH</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more requirements and troubleshooting tips, see <linkText>Connect to an Azure virtual machine with RDP or SSH</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: This procedure shows you how to use the PuTTY program to access the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: This procedure shows you how to use the PuTTY program to access the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Find the Host Name and Port information from the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Find the Host Name and Port information from the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: You can find the information that you need from the dashboard of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: You can find the information that you need from the dashboard of the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Click the virtual machine name and look for the SSH Details in the Quick Glance section of the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Click the virtual machine name and look for the SSH Details in the Quick Glance section of the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Obtain SSH details</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Obtain SSH details</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Open the PuTTY program.
trans-unit.target: Open the PuTTY program.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Host Name and the Port information that you collected from the dashboard, and then click Open.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Host Name and the Port information that you collected from the dashboard, and then click Open.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Open PuTTY</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Open PuTTY</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Log on to the virtual machine using the account that you specified when the machine was created.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the virtual machine using the account that you specified when the machine was created.

trans-unit.source: For more details on how to create a virtual machine with user name and password, see <linkText>Create a Virtual Machine Running Linux</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details on how to create a virtual machine with user name and password, see <linkText>Create a Virtual Machine Running Linux</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Log on to the virtual machine</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Log on to the virtual machine</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The VMAccess extension can help you reset the SSH key or password if you've forgotten it.
trans-unit.target: The VMAccess extension can help you reset the SSH key or password if you've forgotten it.

trans-unit.source: If you've forgotten the user name, you can use the extension to create a new one with sudo authority.
trans-unit.target: If you've forgotten the user name, you can use the extension to create a new one with sudo authority.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see the [How to Reset a Password or SSH for Linux Virtual Machines].
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see the [How to Reset a Password or SSH for Linux Virtual Machines].

trans-unit.source: You can now work with the virtual machine just as you would with any other server.
trans-unit.target: You can now work with the virtual machine just as you would with any other server.

trans-unit.source: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=512138
trans-unit.target: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=512138
